text: 46:17 Ofa Gami 25:8-17Eghtɨ atrivim uan nguazir otevir mam isɨ, uan ingangarir gumazir mam danightɨ, azenir namba 50 otoghtɨ, a nguazir inizir kam uam atrivim danɨngam. 50plan azenibar zurara, Judaba ua biziba ikarvaghamin arazir kam damuam. Dughiar kam otoghtɨ, nguazir kam uam atrivimɨn nguazim gavagham. Kar an bizimra, ezɨ a uan otariba ko uan ovavir boriba, me zurara an ghuavim ikegham.
